name: bhmhockey

scripts.api:migrations: cd apps/api/BHMHockey.Api && dotnet ef migrations add
scripts.api:update-db: cd apps/api/BHMHockey.Api && dotnet ef database update
scripts.test:frontend: yarn workspace @bhmhockey/shared test && yarn workspace @bhmhockey/api-client test && yarn workspace @bhmhockey/mobile test
scripts.test:coverage: yarn test:api -- --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" && yarn test:frontend --coverage

description: BHM Hockey - Monorepo for mobile app and API
